name: Skelly Anatomy 0.1
description:
A very early version of a basic bone anatomy educational application.
For research purposes (seriously)  The game is meant to be on mobile/tablet, but for this preliminary test, we are doing it online :)

Try out all the 3 modes! What do you think?
If you have time, please fill out this application evaluation research questionnaire form afterward. 

https://forms.gle/srhFmzWgbV4yVyNL7

Thank you so much!
